dc_block.name: DC Blocking
dc_block.description:
DC Blocking allows removing a DC Spike / Offset present on some SDR.
 A classic example would the HackRF which often has this sort of issues.

iq_swap.name: IQ Swap
iq_swap.description:
In some cases, the I and Q branches can be swapped.
That can happen when using some downconverters,
or perhaps some software that records the file in an unusual way.
